movies.title: Welcome to Daioly
movies.shortDescription: Welcome to Daioly! We invite you to submit your best Experience of your lifestyle to us! If you are a lifestyle lover visit Daioly.com and send to us your Vision! Wave your Lifestyle! Go to daioly. movies.title: Solve in Venice Beach (LA) 2020
movies.shortDescription: Introducing an Amazing Graffiti artist based in Los Angeles. Solve is one of the best new age graffiti artist that involve this movement in LA. Solve's style is the most clean & sharp. @freaksol Follow IG [fwdevp preset_id="Daioly-tv" video_path="{source:'https://daioly.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Solve-in-Venice-Beach-2020.mp4', label:'1080', videoType:'normal', isPrivate:'no'}" start_at_video="1" playback_rate_speed="1" poster_path="https://daioly.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/thumbnail-Solve-2.jpg"]
